results.title: Gastrointestinal adverse events of metformin treatment in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus: A systematic review, meta-analysis and meta-regression of randomized controlled trials

results.title: Metformin with Temozolomide for Newly Diagnosed Glioblastoma: Results of Phase I Study and a Brief Review of Relevant Studies
results.text_hl: One @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ (JP-02-001) in the Level 2 cohort manifested grade 2 @<m>DISEASE_Diarrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, @DISEASE_Feeding_and_Eating_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001068 @@@appetite loss@@@, and @DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@ during treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ Step 2 dose of 1500 mg/day before Cycle 1 of @CHEMICAL_Temozolomide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077204 @@@TMZ@@@.

results.title: Compounding Metformin for Use in Functional Medicine.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ can cause issues with the gastrointestinal tract and result in @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Diarrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, @DISEASE_Gas_bloat_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C535647 @@@bloating@@@, or @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@.

citations.NLM: Desai S, Thompson T. Compounding Metformin for Use in Functional Medicine. Int J Pharm Compd. 2023 Sep-Oct;27(5):362-366. PMID: 37816179
citations.BibTeX: @article{37816179, title={Compounding Metformin for Use in Functional Medicine.}, author={Desai S and Thompson T}, journal={Int J Pharm Compd}, volume={27}, number={5}, pages={362-366}}

results.title: Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis: A Case Report and Review
results.text_hl: While the @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal@@@ side effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ such as @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Diarrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, and @DISEASE_Heartburn @DISEASE_MESH:D006356 @@@heartburn@@@ are quite common, one dangerous side effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@, is extensively discussed yet rarely reported.

citations.NLM: Ashraf S, Upreti P, Karki S, Khan M, Nasr R. Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis: A Case Report and Review Cureus. 2022 Apr;14(4):e24220. PMID: 35602825
citations.BibTeX: @article{35602825, title={Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis: A Case Report and Review}, author={Ashraf S and Upreti P and Karki S and Khan M and Nasr R}, journal={Cureus}, volume={14}, number={4}, pages={e24220}}

results.title: Metformin-associated lactic acidosis.
results.text_hl: A 58-year-old female with known @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ continued to take her usual medications, including @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, an ACE inhibitor and a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug, while suffering from @<m>DISEASE_Diarrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhoea@@@ and @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@.

citations.NLM: Fadden EJ, Longley C, Mahambrey T. Metformin-associated lactic acidosis. BMJ Case Rep. 2021 Jul 8;14(7):. PMID: 34244196
citations.BibTeX: @article{34244196, title={Metformin-associated lactic acidosis.}, author={Fadden EJ and Longley C and Mahambrey T}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={14}, number={7}}

results.title: Transient Complete Blindness Due to Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis (MALA) Reversed with Hemodialysis
results.text_hl: We hypothesize that her initial @<m>DISEASE_Diarrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@ was an adverse effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or it was a self-limiting viral @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Rueda Prada L, Knopps L, Dumic I, Barusya C, Subramanian A, Charokopos A, Zurob AS. Transient Complete Blindness Due to Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis (MALA) Reversed with Hemodialysis Am J Case Rep. 2022 Apr 18;23():e935730. PMID: 35431313

results.title: Metformin combined with spironolactone vs. metformin alone in polycystic ovary syndrome: a meta-analysis
results.text_hl: Maliha et al. demonstrated that the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was related to a high incidence of side-effects, particularly @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal (GI) reactions@@@ such as @DISEASE_Postoperative_Nausea_and_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D020250 @@@nausea, vomiting@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Diarrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, and @DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@.

citations.NLM: Zeng H, Zhang Y, Huang S, Wu J, Ren W, Zhou L, Huang L, Ye Y. Metformin combined with spironolactone vs. metformin alone in polycystic ovary syndrome: a meta-analysis Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2023;14():1223768. PMID: 37635987
